name: The Paradox Zone
description:
Experience a mind-bending journey through a paradoxical looping dimension in this platformer game, created in just one week for the Brackeys-9 game jam.

Music credit:
Special thanks to Eternal Depth for providing this mesmerizing track that perfectly complements the game.
Visit Eternal Depth's YouTube channel for more amazing music: https://www.youtube.com/@EternalDepth
